contentrichtext.text: {{Expand Chinese|date=December 2008|旬阳县}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Xunyang County |translit_lang1 = [[Chinese language|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_info2 = Xúnyáng Xiàn |translit_lang1_type = [[Traditional Chinese character|Traditional]] |translit_lang1_info = 旬陽縣 |translit_lang1_type1 = [[Simplified Chinese character|Simplified]] |translit_lang1_info1 = 旬阳县 |translit_lang1_type2 = [[Pinyin]] |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_map_caption = Location in the People's Republic of China |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|China}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of China|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Shaanxi]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Prefecture-level city|Prefecture]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Ankang]] |unit_pref = Imperial |area_total_km2 = |population = |population_as_of = |population_blank1_title = Ethnicities |population_density_km2 = auto |latNS = N |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = E |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China standard time]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} '''Xunyang County''' is a county of [[Ankang]], [[Shaanxi]], [[China]]. The administrative seat is in [[Chengguan, Xunyang|Chengguan]] (城关镇 (旬阳县)).<ref>Code = 610928100000, {{Cite web|title=城关镇 (Chengguan Town)|publisher=中华人民共和国国家统计局 (National Bureau of Statistics, People's Republic of China)|url=http://www.stats.gov.cn/tjbz/cxfldm/2011/61/09/610928.html}}</ref> The county covers 3,554 km² and has a population of around 450,000 (2002). ==Transportation== Xunyang is served by the [[Xi'an–Ankang Railway]]. ==Notes== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{Cite web|title=旬阳县概况地图沿革 (Overview, History and Map of Xunyang)|language=Chinese|url=http://www.xzqh.org/html/2008/0610/20469.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20121113232350/http://www.xzqh.org/html/2008/0610/20469.html|archivedate=13 November 2012|deadurl=no}} * {{Cite web|title=走进旬阳 (About Xunyang)|language=Chinese|url=http://www.xunyang.com.cn/govzjxy/lsyg/|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20111206111418/http://www.xunyang.com.cn/govzjxy/lsyg/|archivedate=6 December 2011|deadurl=no}} {{-}} {{County-level divisions of Shaanxi}} {{coord|32|54|23|N|109|25|00|E|region:CN-61_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Shaanxi]] [[Category:Ankang]] {{Shaanxi-geo-stub}}
